wishala lesa wadunu pathkala gasaka mula sita bambaayak (adi hayak) udin uda kotasa peththa mattamata kapa hara ithiri wana ee mul kotasa mudunehi loku wangediyaka athulu kuharaya pamana wu wishala sindurak pahathata sara ee siduru athulata ata askala amu nelli palam hata hatharak saha ee wargaye li kallakinma abayak gasa bima sita e් li kotasa wasi yana paridi adi hayak usata goma warati (wiyalunu goma) goda gasa ee goma waratiwalata gini thaba, goma warati sampurnayenma dawi giyata pasu uthura nagagena with ekata pilissi thibena ee jalasha saraya sahitha nelli kalkaya gena githel ambaara nopirihunu shakthiya athi (panas wiya noikma wu) sthriyak ho purushayek gena is soda nahawa pirisidu kota piruwata andawa masi manduruwangen uwadura nowana paridi aaraksha sahithawa wishesha athulu kamarayaka katha me nelli kalkayak unu kala ela kirith pamanakma dinakata thun wela bagin dinapatha masak aahara washayen diya yuthuya.
